title: Tiger Woods' Enemies List
headline: Tiger Woods' Enemies List
description: Like Richard Nixon, Tiger Woods has a long list of perceived enemies, and Steve Williams, who just released a tell-all book that touched on what it was like caddying for Woods, now has another reason to be on this list that includes the illustrious company of Hank Haney, Brandel Chamblee, Sergio Garcia and many others.
body: Like Richard Nixon, Tiger Woods has a long list of perceived enemies, and Steve Williams, who just released a tell-all book that touched on what it was like caddying for Woods, now has another reason to be on this list that includes the illustrious company of Hank Haney, Brandel Chamblee, Sergio Garcia and many others.
